reviewText:
I was hoping for a thoughtful, informative primer on wine. Instead, I got a strange mishmash of history of California wine (admittedly interesting, but not what I was looking for) and smothering encouragement that "wine is fun and easy" (not exact quotes, but the sentiment).

Also, feels like it was produced in 1995.

Finally, way overpriced. Thought I was buying the full set for $10. Now, would be willing to steam full set for ~$5.
